Welcome

I am a logical and creative developer who takes delight in all projects I get involved in. I take pride in my ability to adapt to evolving situations and pivot when necessary. When faced with a new challenge, I take it on piece by piece, with enthusiasm and fervor.

My Work

Curator

Designed and developed by a team of three, Curator seeks to help students of any level know more about the text they are reading. By using an annotation, comment and upvote system, students can get answers to their questions with more context than a simple Internet search would provide.

Book Trader

Created to allow students to buy and sell their books to others at nearby universities, BookTrader is meant to be an alternative to having to go to the university book store.

Ultimate Set List

Create your perfect setlist for your favorite bands!

Fizz Buzz

Basic Fizz Buzz exercise.

Part of LeWagon Tokyo Curriculum

Wagon Race

Basic race game using Javascript.

Part of LeWagon Tokyo Curriculum
